brainly_data.question:
Which of the following uses a Microsoft tool that enables drag-and-drop applications?

Java
Lisaac
Objective-C
Visual Basic
brainly_data.subject: Computers and technology

all_answers.question:
Which of the following uses a Microsoft tool that enables drag-and-drop applications?

Java
Lisaac
Objective-C
Visual Basic
all_answers.subject: Computers and technology
all_answers.text: This uses a Microsoft tool that enables drag-and-drop applications and it is Visual Basic. A drag-and-drop operation is analogous to a copy-and-paste or cut-and-paste operation that is used to transfer data.
